name: The Vibin' Bot
description:
In this game your objective is to keep the music going, avoid enemies and hurry to chase the ever-moving cassette and rewind it before the song ends.

This is my first ever game jam, any feedback would be appreciated!

Music by Mrthenoronha:

  • Menu song
  • Game song

Controls:

  • Move: A/D - Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Pause: Esp - P

Submission to Brackeys Jam 2020.2
